text: Maastricht University (Dutch: Universiteit Maastricht), shortened to UM, is a public university in Maastricht, a city in the province of Limburg, the Netherlands. Maastricht University was established in 1976. It has about 21,000 students. Its focus is on medicine, neuroscience and social sciences. == Other websites == * Category:1976 establishments in Europe Category:Colleges and universities in the Netherlands Category:Maastricht Category:1970s establishments in the Netherlands
title: Maastricht University
